This crack doesn't load the saves, but your saves are in "Bioshock InfiniteBinariesWin32ProfileSavesSaveData"

But the FLT crack loads saves, so dl that crack, run the game once and exit. Now you copy the saves from the folder i mentioned, and paste them into "AppDataLocalFLTSteam8870remoteSaveData"

Ta-da! No need to start over again.

Sorry the paths are "/Bioshock Infinite/Binaries/Win32/Profile/Saves/SaveData"
and
"/AppData/Local/FLT/Steam/8870/remote/SaveData"
